articles.author: Larisha Paul
articles.title: Trump Forgets He Hates Taylor Swift When He’s Told She’s Getting Married - Rolling Stone
articles.description: Donald Trump commented on Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce's engagement news, seemingly changing his opinion about the singer he previously antagonized.
articles.content: Love can make you do crazy things. For Taylor Swift, it made her go on a sports podcast, New Heights, hosted by her now-fiancé Travis Kelce. For Donald Trump, it made him forget that he hates Swift a… [+2329 chars]

articles.title: ‘KPop Demon Hunters' Breaks Netflix All-Time Viewing Record - Forbes
articles.description: “Red Notice” was just dethroned as Netflix’s top movie.
articles.content: The Netflix smash hit KPop Demon Hunters has broken the all-time record for the most-watched film ever on the platform, Netflix said Tuesday, after successfully jumping into theaters with a series of… [+3638 chars]
